attributes.action: Councils to provide free youth clubs in towns
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is for the Government to provide free sports and youth clubs during evenings to give the youth something constructive to do. My local free sports club currently has a waiting list of 2 years of kids keen to learn new sports.

A lot of clubs exist that are run by volunteers around the UK. However, funding is always an issue and one that should be addressed. Kids need a way to express themselves and these clubs provide a place for them to go and burn some energy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
